name: Lifebuoy Kohomba & Aloe Body Soap
description: Kohomba (neem) is known in India for its antibacterial properties. Its natural germ protection formula washes away germs to provide 100% better skin protection. Its unique fragrance blends the power of Neem to give you a refreshing shower and provides naturals germ protection to your skin. Contains antibacterial properties which provides a natural germ protection to your skin. Aloe helps reduce inflammation in rashes and provides a natural protection for dry skin. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
